zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，短期观望]
zh.content:
当前以太坊（ETH/USD）价格在2934.87美元附近震荡整理，24小时内轻微上涨0.11%。价格在2939.08美元的高点和2923.33美元的低点之间波动，显示出市场的谨慎态度。整体趋势偏向横盘整理，缺乏强烈的上行动能。

从技术指标来看，MACD显示出负值，表明短期内卖压仍然存在，而RSI尚无数据提供判断。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）位于2940.30美元，表明这一水平可能成为短期内的关键阻力位。如果价格突破这一阻力，可能会引发更多买盘。

支撑位方面，2923.33美元是近期低点，若价格跌破该水平，可能会引发更大幅度的回调。因此，投资者应密切关注该支撑位的表现，以评估市场情绪。

建议投资者在当前市场环境中采取观望策略，避免在未明确趋势时进行大额交易。如若突破2940美元可考虑入场，但需设立止损以控制风险，切勿盲目追高。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently trading at $2,934.87, showing a slight uptick of 0.11% over the last 24 hours. This modest price movement suggests a period of consolidation following recent volatility. The high and low of the day, $2,939.08 and $2,923.33 respectively, indicate a tight trading range. The lack of significant momentum may reflect market participants' indecision, which could lead to further sideways action or a breakout in either direction.

In terms of technical indicators, the MACD currently stands at -3.85494, indicating bearish momentum, although the absence of a signal line makes it challenging to gauge the strength of this trend. The SMA(20) at $2,940.30 serves as a short-term resistance level. If Ethereum can regain momentum and close above this SMA, it may attract bullish sentiment, suggesting a potential rally toward the higher resistance levels around $2,950 and beyond.

Support levels are critical to monitor, particularly the recent low of $2,923.33. A sustained drop below this level could trigger further selling pressure, potentially leading to a test of the next support around $2,900. Traders should exercise caution and consider stop-loss orders if the price approaches this support to mitigate risks. Conversely, a bounce off this support could present a buying opportunity, particularly if accompanied by a favorable shift in indicators.

As market participants evaluate their positions, it is essential to remain vigilant for any signs of increased volatility. A breakout above $2,940 could signal renewed bullish momentum, while a breakdown below $2,923 would likely lead to increased bearish sentiment. Traders should keep an eye on market news and developments around Ethereum, as these can significantly impact price action in the near term.
